00039 Graphic::Graphic() {
00040     //initialisation du son
00041     FSOUND_Init(44100,32,0);
00042     //initialisation des graphismes
00043     SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO | SDL_INIT_TIMER);
00044 }

00052 Graphic::~Graphic() {
00053     //liberation du module de son
00054     FSOUND_Close();
00055     SDL_Quit();
00056 }

00066 void Graphic::Initialisation(int largeur, int hauteur, int time_trans, Simulator * simu)
00067 {
00068     pthread_t thread;
00069 
00070     _ecran = SDL_SetVideoMode(largeur*TAILLE_PXL,hauteur*TAILLE_PXL,32,SDL_HWSURFACE | SDL_DOUBLEBUF);
00071 
00072     SDL_WM_SetCaption("Simulation SMA ZZ2F2",NULL);
00073 
00074     if(_ecran == NULL)
00075     {
00076         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00077     }
00078 
00079     _arme  =  IMG_Load("knife.jpg");
00080     _humain = IMG_Load("humain.jpg");
00081     _zombie = IMG_Load("zombie.jpg");
00082     _background = IMG_Load("background.jpg");
00083 
00084     if( _arme == NULL || _humain == NULL || _zombie == NULL || _background == NULL)
00085     {
00086         cerr << "Erreur Image" << endl;
00087         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00088     }
00089 
00090     _ding = FSOUND_Sample_Load(FSOUND_FREE, "bell.mp3",0,0,0);
00091     if(_ding == NULL)
00092     {
00093         cerr << "Erreur son" << endl;
00094         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00095     }
00096 
00097     _simu = simu;
00098     _time_transition = time_trans;
00099 
00100     //lancement du thread pour la fin de la simu
00101     pthread_create(&thread,NULL,Fermeture,NULL);
00102 }

00109 void Graphic::LiberationRessource()
00110 {
00111     FSOUND_Sample_Free(_ding);
00112     SDL_FreeSurface(_arme);
00113     SDL_FreeSurface(_ecran);
00114     SDL_FreeSurface(_humain);
00115     SDL_FreeSurface(_zombie);
00116     SDL_FreeSurface(_background);
00117 }

00125 void Graphic::AfficherArme(int x, int y)
00126 {
00127     SDL_Rect position;
00128     position.x = TAILLE_PXL*x;
00129     position.y = TAILLE_PXL*y;
00130     SDL_BlitSurface(_arme,NULL,_ecran,&position);
00131 }

00165 void Graphic::AfficherBackground()
00166 {
00167     SDL_Rect position;
00168     position.x = 0;
00169     position.y = 0;
00170     SDL_BlitSurface(_background,NULL,_ecran,&position);
00171 }

00179 void Graphic::Transition()
00180 {
00181     FSOUND_PlaySound(FSOUND_FREE,_ding);
00182     TransitionTourSimulation();
00183 }
00184 
00190 void Graphic::TransitionTour()
00191 {
00192     SDL_Delay(_time_transition);
00193 }

00200 void Graphic::TransitionTourSimulation()
00201 {
00202     SDL_Delay(_time_transition);
00203 }

00210 void Graphic::Rafraichir()
00211 {
00212     SDL_Flip(_ecran);
00213 }

00221 void * Graphic::Fermeture(void * useless)
00222 {
00223     SDL_Event event;
00224     bool continuer = false;
00225     while(!continuer)
00226     {
00227         SDL_PollEvent(&event);
00228         switch(event.type)
00229         {
00230             case SDL_QUIT:
00231                 _simu->FinSimu();
00232                 continuer = true;
00233                 break;
00234         }
00235     }
00236     return NULL;
00237 }
